timeline.bodyText: Why remove the tes credential hook?
timeline.author: shaguptashaikh

replies.bodyText: It is already configured to use TES in the client factory
replies.author: MikeDombo

timeline.bodyText: This is supposed to be temporary, GG will eventually be available in other regions, add a TODO for that? Or leave it the way it was and not test in other regions until GG becomes available so that we don't have to come back and change this again later
timeline.author: shaguptashaikh

timeline.bodyText: Which resource is it complaining as not being closed? The getObjectsAsBytes? Can we try-resources that block?
timeline.author: philcali

replies.bodyText: No, it is the s3 client, which we shouldn't be closing.
replies.author: MikeDombo
